title: Kazrog Recabinet 4 v4.0.1 Pre-Activated-R2R [ATOM]
description:
Description:
Recabinet 4, featuring Thermionik, is the ultimate amp and speaker cabinet simulator for guitar and bass. It is an audio effects plugin compatible with VST, AU, and AAX plugin formats on Mac and Windows, supporting 32 and 64 bit systems.
Recabinet is fully compatible with Avid Pro Tools, Steinberg Cubase, Apple Logic Pro and GarageBand, Cockos Reaper, Presonus Studio One, Ableton Live, Cakewalk Sonar, Tracktion, and more

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Preamp and Poweramp mixing and linking
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Industry-leading Speaker Dynamics modeling integrated into Thermionik power amp section
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Individual internal section bypass toggles (Thermionik, Recabinet, preamp, power amp, EQ bands.)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢4 adjustable quality levels to balance CPU usage with sound quality
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢New preset browser



What's New: 
(Released: November 17, 2014)

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Maintenance update to address numerous issues with the initial release.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢CPU usage reduced by 15-20% in most hosts.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Presence control issues have been fixed.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Bypass toggles now conserve CPU when modules are bypassed.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Odd noise burst issues have been resolved.
